pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa upaṭṭhāko mahāmatto āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.3: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā ayyaṃ upanandaṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.4: Atha kho so dūto yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.6: “idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.8: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṃ dūtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.9: “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.10: Evaṃ vutte, so dūto āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.12: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako ārāmaṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.13: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṃ dūtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.15: Atha kho so dūto taṃ upāsakaṃ saññāpetvā yenāyasmā upanando sakyaputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.17: “yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi saññatto so mayā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.18: Upasaṅkamatu āyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.19: Tena kho pana samayena so mahāmatto āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.20: “paribhuñjatu ayyo taṃ cīvaraṃ, icchāma mayaṃ ayyena taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuttan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.22: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṃ upāsakaṃ na kiñci avacāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.23: Dutiyampi kho so mahāmatto āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.24: “paribhuñjatu ayyo taṃ cīvaraṃ, icchāma mayaṃ ayyena taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuttan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.25: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṃ upāsakaṃ na kiñci avacāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.26: Tatiyampi kho so mahāmatto āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.1.27: “paribhuñjatu ayyo taṃ cīvaraṃ, icchāma mayaṃ ayyena taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuttan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena negamassa samayo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.2: Negamena ca katikā katā hoti— “yo pacchā āgacchati paññāsaṃ baddho”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.4: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto yena so upāsako tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ upāsakaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.8: Negamena ca katikā katā hoti—‘yo pacchā āgacchati paññāsaṃ baddho’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.9: “Ajjeva me, āvuso, cīvaraṃ dehī”ti ovaṭṭikāya parāmasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.11: Atha kho so upāsako āyasmatā upanandena sakyaputtena nippīḷiyamāno āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā pacchā agamāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.13: “kissa tvaṃ, ayyo, pacchā āgato, paññāsaṃ jīnosī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.15: Atha kho so upāsako tesaṃ manussānaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.21: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.22: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.26: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.33: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.2.34: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.1: “Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa rājā vā rājabhoggo vā brāhmaṇo vā gahapatiko vā dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.2: ‘iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.3: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.4: ‘idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpannan’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.6: tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.7: ‘na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma. Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, kālena kappiyan’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.9: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.11: cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.13: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.14: ‘yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi saññatto so mayā, upasaṅkamatu āyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.16: cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.18: Dvattikkhattuṃ codayamāno sārayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.19: no ce abhinipphādeyya, catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.20: Catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūto uddissa tiṭṭhamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.21: tato ce uttari vāyamamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.22: No ce abhinipphādeyya, yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ, tattha sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ dūto vā pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.23: ‘yaṃ kho tumhe āyasmanto bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha, na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:1.3.24: yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassā’ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.2: bhikkhussatthāya, bhikkhuṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā, bhikkhuṃ acchādetukāmo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.10: ṭhapetvā rājaṃ rājabhoggaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ avaseso gahapatiko nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.12: hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā muttā vā maṇi vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.19: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.20: “idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ. Paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpannan”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.22: tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.23: “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma. Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma, kālena kappiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.25: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.27: Cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.29: Na vattabbo— “tassa dehīti vā, so vā nikkhipissati, so vā parivattessati, so vā cetāpessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.31: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.32: “yaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi saññatto so mayā. Upasaṅkamatu āyasmā kālena, cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.34: Cīvaratthikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.36: Na vattabbo— “dehi me cīvaraṃ, āhara me cīvaraṃ, parivattehi me cīvaraṃ, cetāpehi me cīvaran”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.41: no ce abhinipphādeti, tattha gantvā tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.42: Na āsane nisīditabbaṃ. Na āmisaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.47: Sace āsane vā nisīdati, āmisaṃ vā paṭiggaṇhāti, dhammaṃ vā bhāsati, ṭhānaṃ bhañjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.3: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.6: “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena abhinipphāditaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.11: No ce abhinipphādeyya, yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhataṃ tattha sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ dūto vā pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.12: “yaṃ kho tumhe, āyasmanto, bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.2.13: Yuñjantāyasmanto sakaṃ, mā vo sakaṃ vinassā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.1: Atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena atirekasaññī abhinipphādeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.2: Atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena vematiko abhinipphādeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.3: Atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena ūnakasaññī abhinipphādeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.4: Ūnakatikkhattuṃ codanāya ūnakachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena atirekasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.5: Ūnakatikkhattuṃ codanāya ūnakachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.3.6: Ūnakatikkhattuṃ codanāya ūnakachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena ūnakasaññī anāpatti.
